message: As I'm getting ready to leave, I hear some sounds coming from the first floor.
I open my door a bit to see what's going on. Ren slips out through the gap, then returns a few seconds later.
I pick up Ren, put him in my bag, then poke my head into Clear's room.
When I step outside, a wet smell fills my nose. It's gonna rain soon.
Ren pops out of my bag, ears twitching. It's coming from an alley next to Glitter.
I run down the alley until it hits a corner.
As I round the corner, I stop dead in my tracks.
